Class GameTimerThread

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
android.os.HandlerThread
cz.cuni.mff.desitka.client.gameLogic.GameTimerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameStates, Runnable
public class GameTimerThread extends android.os.HandlerThread implements GameStates
A thread for managing game timers and game state transitions.
